titles.title: You've Got To Keep Walking, Keep On Walking

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You've got to keep walking, keep on walking
Walking in the light of the Lord,
You're going to get there someday
As you walk the right way,
walking in the light of the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You've got to keep walking, keep walking
Walking in the light of the Lord, we'll free creation someday,
As we walk the right way. Walking in the light of the Lord.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
O it's a glorious Church, without spot or wrinkle
Washed in the blood of the Lamb. (2x)
